## Run & render specified "/R" scripts

```{r}
#| label: Run & render specified /R scripts
#| include: false

# list of files to run/render in /R
# Write the files in the list you want to render


qmd_files <- c(                 
  "100_test.qmd"
  )

#Run/render
qmd_files |> 
  lapply(render_qmd) |> 
  invisible()
```

## Run & render ALL "/R" scripts

```{r}
#| label: Run & render ALL /R scripts
#| include: false

#list of files NOT to run (do not change).
not_run_qmd_files <- c(
  "00_all.qmd",
  "99_proj_func.R"
)

#list of files in /R for rendering
all_qmd_files <- list.files(path = ".", full.names = FALSE) |> 
  setdiff(not_run_qmd_files)

#run and render
all_qmd_files |> 
  lapply(render_qmd) |> 
  invisible()
```
